title: A Study in Shame
description: Lucinda Salisbury is the perfect PA, as elegant as she is efficient. But her reserved exterior hides a secret.‘A Study in Shame’ is an intensely kinky erotica novel perfect for anyone lusting after much more than ‘Fifty Shades of Grey’.Sex makes Lucy feel ashamed, and the more ashamed she feels, the more she likes it.An executive team building trip in the country provides her with the public undoing she has always craved.Other titles in the Lucy Salisbury series is for SpankingMy Secret Life in Paris
author: Lucy Salisbury
